title: Premium Wordpress Themes pack - Grove Pixels
description:
Pack includes:

Blogland Wordpress theme by Grove Pixels

Cassions Wordpress theme by Grove Pixels

Fashify Wordpress theme by Grove Pixels

Fooding Wordpress theme by Grove Pixels

Gatsby Wordpress theme by Grove Pixels

Glob Wordpress theme by Grove Pixels

Magad Wordpress theme by Grove Pixels

Techfind Wordpress theme by Grove Pixels


About Grove Pixels Themes:
-------------------------

Premium Wordpress Themes for you.
We create beautiful premium WordPress themes and WordPress templates that are beautiful,
intelligent and easy to use. Get your best matching theme now!


Designed for both beginners and experts.
All of our themes have beautiful designs and come with features, functionalities that are very
powerful yet simple to use by clicks from Grove Framework.
Wordpress 4.0+

As we follow up anything about WordPress, it brings us to every latest updates. The themes is now compatible with WordPress 4.0+.
Grove Framework

Use Grove Options to get up, running in minutes and start customizing your new website with just a few clicks of mouse. Let's keep things simple.
SEO Optimized

The theme coded by HTML5, CSS3 And Schema.org for smart design, faster speed, rich content, better user experience and higher ranking.
Theme Customizer

Change the layout, logo, favicon, apple icon, color styles and web fonts in GROVE Options. Perfect if you are customizing for your clients.
Page Templates

The theme comes packaged with a 404 page, search page, full-width page and archives page for efficient quick links to all your content.
Custom Widgets

This theme comes with several custom widgets for Sidebars, like: Newsletter, Social Widget, Recent Posts, Popular Posts, Review Posts...
Friendly and fast support team.
When you come on board with us, you get more than just an amazing package of themes, you get
the peace of mind that comes with an incredible support team.
Responsive

The theme adapts automatically for any web browser size of device resolutions: mobile, tablet or desktop. Your website just looks perfect anywhere.
WooCommerce

WooCommerce is the most popular WordPress eCommerce plugin. Packed full of features, perfectly integrated into self-hosted WordPress websites.
BBPress Forum

Fully compatible with bbPress, a forum software for Wordpress. bbPress is focused on ease of integration, ease of use, web standards, and speed.
Jetpack Plugin

Jetpack adds powerful features previously only available tousers including customization, traffic, mobile, content...
Shortcodes Plugin

Shortcodes Ultimate is a popular shortcodes plugin with 40+ professional looking shortcodes. You can also create your own shortcodes.
Translation

Translate the theme into any language you wish using the included .po/.mo files. Compatible with WPML plugin. Everything you need to get started.

URL:http://www.grovepixels.com/themes/
